metadata.title: CVE-2016-9583 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An out-of-bounds heap read vulnerability was found in the jpc_pi_nextpcrl()function of jasper before 2.0.6 when processing crafted input.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9583` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjasper-runtime - 1.900.1-debian1-2.4ubuntu1
libjasper1 - 1.900.1-debian1-2.4ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jasper package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.900.1-debian1-2.4ubuntu1').
